DOC.brief_summary: To compare the changes in mean sitting DBP from baseline after 4 weeks of therapy with either candesartan cilexetil/HCT combination therapy or candesartan cilexetil monotherapy regimen
DOC.brief_title: Candesartan Effect in Second Stage Arterial Hypertension
DOC.criteria: Stage II essential hypertension (SBP≥ 160 or DBP≥100 mmHg), untreated, or treated with a maximum of 2 class of antihypertensive drugs Current serumcreatinine >3 mg/dL, Current serumpotassium >5.5 mmol/L, 16. Pregnant or lactating women or women of childbearing potential who were not protected from pregnancy
